message.content:
cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.IR, cs.NE 

This paper is about abstractive text summarization, which is a natural language processing task. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CL (Computation and Language). The paper also proposes a novel approach using graph convolutional networks (GCNs) for syntactic representation learning, which falls under the category of machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). Additionally, the paper involves information retrieval (cs.IR) as it deals with extracting salient information from a document. Finally, the proposed approach uses selective attention mechanism, which is a common technique in neural networks (cs.NE).
